name: Hunt for Red October, The [GB]
description:
The RED OCTOBER, Russia's top secret and nearly undetectable nuclear missile submarine is heading West .... TO DEFECT!

Can you navigate the treacherous Reykjanes ridge; evade the formidable Soviet Red Banner fleet and rendezvous with the US Navy in this deadly battle for survival.

When to attack; when to hide; when to run; THE DECISION IS YOURS.
